name: HumanitZ
author: engels74@marx.ps
description: HumanitZ is a co-op, isometric, open world survival game in a world ended by the zombie outbreak. As one of the few human survivors, try to last as long as “humanly” possible. The past can’t be changed, but you can make a difference today for the future of humanity.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'

##
#
# Variables
# STEAM_USER, STEAM_PASS, STEAM_AUTH - Steam user setup. If a user has 2fa enabled it will most likely fail due to timeout. Leave blank for anon install.
# WINDOWS_INSTALL - if it's a windows server you want to install set to 1
# SRCDS_APPID - steam app id found here - https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List
# SRCDS_BETAID - beta branch of a steam app. Leave blank to install normal branch
# SRCDS_BETAPASS - password for a beta branch should one be required during private or closed testing phases.. Leave blank for no password.
# INSTALL_FLAGS - Any additional SteamCMD  flags to pass during install.. Keep in mind that steamcmd auto update process in the docker image might overwrite or ignore these when it performs update on server boot.
# AUTO_UPDATE - Adding this variable to the egg allows disabling or enabling automated updates on boot. Boolean value. 0 to disable and 1 to enable.
#
 ##

# Install packages. Default packages below are not required if using our existing install image thus speeding up the install process.
#apt -y update
#apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit 

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## making server files executable
chmod +x /mnt/server/TSSGame/Binaries/Linux/TSSGameServer-Linux-Shipping

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: [REQUIRED] Steam App ID
variables.description: Steam App ID of HumanitZ Server

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Enable automatic updates on boot

variables.name: [REQUIRED] Steam Beta Branch
variables.description: This ensures the script will grab the Linux version of the server

variables.name: [REQUIRED] Steam Query Port
variables.description: Steam Query Port

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name of the server

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Server password (if any)

variables.name: Save Name
variables.description: Name of the save-file for the server

variables.name: Admin Password
variables.description: Password for the admin

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players allowed

variables.name: Only Allowed Players
variables.description: Restrict server to allowed players only

variables.name: Saving World Interval
variables.description: Save game every x seconds.

variables.name: Permanent Death
variables.description: 0=Off, 1=Individual perma-death, 2=All players experience perma-death

variables.name: On Death
variables.description: 0=Only lose backpack, and weapon in hand, 1=Previous + pockets, and backpack, 2=All previous + Equipment

variables.name: PvP
variables.description: 0/1 Off/On. Enable or disable Player vs Player.

variables.name: Clear Infection
variables.description: 0=Respawning does not rid you of the infection, 1=You lose it upon respawning

variables.name: Eagle Eye
variables.description: 1=Able to purchase the eagle eye skill, 0=You can't

variables.name: Air Drop
variables.description: 1=Enabled, 0=Disabled. Controls whether air drops are enabled.

variables.name: Weapon Durability
variables.description: 1=Weapons break when reaching 0% durability except crowbar, 0=Only improvised weapons break at 0% durability

variables.name: Multiplayer Sleep
variables.description: 1=Time passes if everyone performs the sleep emote at the same time, 0=Passing time is disabled

variables.name: Building Health
variables.description: Health multiplier of player placed buildings. By default set to "1".

variables.name: Loot Respawn
variables.description: 1=Loot does respawn, 0=Never respawn

variables.name: Loot Respawn Timer
variables.description: If loot respawns how long does it take in minutes

variables.name: Pickup Respawn Timer
variables.description: Time in minutes it takes to respawn pickups, 0 to disable.

variables.name: Loot Rarity
variables.description: 0=Scarce, 1=Low, 2=Default, 3=Plentiful, 4=Abundant

variables.name: Air Drop Interval
variables.description: Air drop every X day

variables.name: Zombie Difficulty (Health)
variables.description: 0=Very Easy, 1=Easy, 2=Default, 3=Hard, 4=Very Hard, 5=Nightmare

variables.name: Zombie Difficulty (Speed)
variables.description: 0=Very Easy, 1=Easy, 2=Default, 3=Hard, 4=Very Hard, 5=Nightmare

variables.name: Zombie Difficulty (Damage)
variables.description: 0=Very Easy, 1=Easy, 2=Default, 3=Hard, 4=Very Hard, 5=Nightmare

variables.name: Human Difficulty
variables.description: 0=Very Easy, 1=Easy, 2=Default, 3=Hard, 4=Very Hard, 5=Nightmare

variables.name: Zombie Amount Multiplier
variables.description: Zombie spawn count multiplier

variables.name: Human Amount Multiplier
variables.description: Hostile humans spawn count multiplier

variables.name: Zombie Dog Multiplier
variables.description: Zombie dog spawn count multiplier

variables.name: Zombie Respawn Timer
variables.description: Time in minutes for zombies to respawn

variables.name: Human Respawn Timer
variables.description: Time in minutes for hostile humans to respawn

variables.name: Animal Respawn Timer
variables.description: Time in minutes for animals to respawn

variables.name: Starting Season
variables.description: 0=Summer, 1=Autum, 2=Winter, 3=Spring

variables.name: Days Per Season
variables.description: How many days each season lasts

variables.name: Day Duration
variables.description: Day duration in minutes

variables.name: Night Duration
variables.description: Night duration in minutes

variables.name: Vital Drain
variables.description: How fast your vitals drain 0=Slow, 1=Normal, 2=Fast

variables.name: Dog Companions Enabled
variables.description: Enable finding dog companions you can recruit

variables.name: Dog Companion Amount
variables.description: Number of companion dogs that could spawn randomly

variables.name: Recruit Companion Dogs
variables.description: Allow players to recruit companion dog

variables.name: Companion Health
variables.description: Dog companion health - 0=Low 1=Default 2=High

variables.name: Companion Damage
variables.description: Dog companion damage - 0=Low 1=Default 2=High

variables.name: No Death Feedback
variables.description: 0 to enable player died notification in chat - 1 to disable player died notification in chat.

variables.name: Allow Dismantle
variables.description: 1 = Enable players to dismantle their own buildings, 0 = Disable

variables.name: Allow House Dismantle
variables.description: 1 = Players are able to dismantle house props, 0 = Disable

variables.name: Territory
variables.description: 1 = Enabled. In PVE you are not allowed to build in someone's spawn point area. Only non recruit clan members can. 0 = Disable

variables.name: Decay
variables.description: By default 3600, the crafted "Spawn Point" loses 1 durability every 1 hour. This is used to deal with territory build restrictions, so players have to repair their spawn point.

variables.name: Pickup Cleanup
variables.description: How long in minutes it takes for dropped pickups to be destroyed (Pickups part of the world will not be considered), a value of 0 means no cleanup is done.

variables.name: Fake Building Cleanup
variables.description: How long in minutes it takes for the white blueprint building to be destroyed, a value of 0 means no cleanup is done.
